title: joeperry
author: joeperry

comments.author: joeperry
comments.created_time: June 26, 2023, 11:24:58 AMLast edit: July 03, 2023, 04:03:56 AM by joeperry
comments.body: The raffle draw will be held on Monday July 03, 2023 (Forum time). Cut-off for application is until Sunday July 02 (23:59:59 | Forum time).Last numbers of the hash from the blocks that I will choose will be the winners.Slots:Code:00 - 01 - 02 - GazetaBitcoin03 - 04 - 05 - 06 - 07 - 08 - acroman0809 - 10 - 11 - libert1912 - 13 - yhiaali314 - 15 - 16 - 17 - tiCeR18 - notblox119 - 20 - 21 - 22 - 23 - 24 - mv198625 - m201726 - 27 - 28 - iwantmyhomepaidwithbtc229 - 30 - 31 - 32 - khiholangkang33 - 34 - 35 - Docnaster36 - 37 - 38 - 39 - 40 - 41 - pawel777742 - Nara189243 - sompitonov44 - 45 - 46 - 47 - 48 - Baoo49 - suzanne522350 - jossiel51 - 52 - 53 - 54 - Haunebu55 - 56 - 57 - Daltonik58 - 59 - 60 - 61 - 62 - temple63 - Asuspawer0964 - 65 - 66 - mvdheuvel198367 - Sarah Azhari68 - 69 - shasan70 - ajiz13871 - 72 - 73 - 74 - 75 - 76 - wwzsocki77 - 78 - 79 - Myleschetty80 - 81 - 82 - 83 - Avirunes84 - 85 - 86 - 87 - 88 - malcovi289 - 90 - 91 -92 - summonerrk93 - 94 - 95 - 96 - 97 - 98 - hosseinimr9399 - bitLeapNote:

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: I've invited a few people, so hopefully they'll join us for the raffles and they will enjoy Utopia project. Thanks for the raffles @joeperry and Utopia team, it's a great way to introduce people to the project, and to motivate them to install a new software
